title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
Introducing the [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR, the ultimate solution for your power needs while traveling to Italy, Uruguay, and Chile! This versatile adapter features a 3 prong grounded plug that is compatible with standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs. 

With 2 USB ports and 2 American outlets, this 4 in 1 outlet adaptor is perfect for charging your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other electric products. The dual USB ports can charge your devices at up to 2.4A, ensuring a fast and efficient charging experience. 

Safety is our top priority, which is why this adapter is grounded with a safe 3 prong plug. It also has a maximum capacity of 2500 watts, 250 volts, and 10 amps, making it suitable for a wide range of devices. 

Designed to be ultra-light and compact, this adapter is easy to carry and won't take up much space in your luggage. Its dimensions of 2.8*2.6*2.3 inches make it the perfect travel companion. 

Rest assured that this adapter meets the highest quality standards, as it is CE and FCC certified. Plus, it comes with a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service, ensuring your peace of mind. 

Please note that this adapter is not a converter. Your devices must support 100V-250V dual voltage if not for low-power electronics. 

Don't miss out on this must-have travel accessory. Get your [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR today and stay powered up wherever you go!

This power adapter is compatible with standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs, and supports a wide voltage range of 100V-250V. However, please note that it is not a converter and devices must support 100V-250V dual voltage if not for low power electronics.

With a 12-month warranty and friendly customer service availability, you can trust the VINTAR Italy Travel Power Adapter to meet your needs and provide reliable power wherever you go. Don't miss out on this essential travel companion - get your [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR today!
